# Motivation

Getting up to speed with R using dose-response for 32 drugs against 6
bacterial strains.


# Tasks

1. Plot raw OD growth curves. [Input data](doc/tasks/01_dat.csv) and expected
   [output plot](doc/tasks/01_out.pdf) are provided. The data is for azithromycin
   against _S. flexneri_ M90T from day 2022-05-04 (first replicate).
